lead_paragraph: Vintage-style baseball players in towns on opposite sides of the country gathered to celebrate a famous poem and give life to a rivalry.
snippet: Vintage-style baseball players in towns on opposite sides of the country gathered to celebrate a famous poem and give life to a rivalry.

headline.print_headline: Joy in Mudville, Wherever It May Be
headline.main: Joy in Mudville, Wherever It May Be
headline.seo: Game Brings Joy to Mudville, Wherever It May Be
headline.sub: Teams Who Claim the Legacy of ‘Casey at the Bat’ Meet on the Field;
